title: Detailed guide: Disability Confident: how to sign up to the employer scheme
text:
Level 2: Sign up to become a Disability Confident employer Level 3: Disability Confident leader 
By stepping up to become a Disability Confident leader, your business can gain recognition among your peers. You’ll be acting as a champion within your local and business community, your supply chain and your networks. You’ll be showing disabled people that you are serious about leading the way and about helping other businesses to become Disability Confident. 
To become a Disability Confident leader, you’ll need to: have your self-assessment validated from outside your business show what you have done as a Disability Confident leader 
When we receive your validated assessment, we’ll send you a badge to use on your website and other materials for 3 years. Read more about how to become a Disability Confident leader PDF , 254KB , 18 pages This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format. If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email . Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use. More information about becoming Disability Confident 
Read guidance and case studies about employing and retaining disabled people and people with health conditions. 
You can get support from service providers in your journey to become a Disability Confident employer.
